definition: front/forward/ahead/first/top (followed by a number)/future/ago/before/BC (e.g. 前293年)/former/formerly
to carry (hanging down from the hand)/to lift/to put forward/to mention/to raise (an issue)/upwards character stroke/lifting brush stroke (in painting)/scoop for measuring liquid
strip/item/article/clause (of law or treaty)/classifier for long thin things (ribbon, river, road, trousers etc)
item/component/classifier for events, things, clothes etc

sentences.english: We are willing to negotiate with them as long as there are no pre-conditions.
sentences.chinese: 只要没有前提条件，我们愿意与他们谈判。

sentences.english: The property relationship is the premising constituent of the embezzling crime for its specific character.
sentences.chinese: 具有特定性质的财产关系是侵占罪成立的前提条件。

sentences.english: Read the documentation for an up-to-date list of prerequisites.
sentences.chinese: 请阅读前提条件中最新的列表。

sentences.english: Is a new constitutional framework a pre-condition for taking part in elections?
sentences.chinese: 新的宪法架构是你们参加选举的前提条件吗？

sentences.english: Look, I'll sit down with anybody, but there's got to be pre-conditions.
sentences.chinese: 你看，我会和任何人坐下来谈，但必须得有前提条件。

sentences.english: The core competence of enterprises is the precondition of diversified development of enterprises.
sentences.chinese: 企业的核心能力是企业发展多角化的前提条件。

sentences.english: I think the pre-condition for harmony is toaccept diversity.
sentences.chinese: 我认为和谐的前提条件是接受多样化。

sentences.english: This break a lap, the former is a prerequisite for the latter.
sentences.chinese: 这一破一立，前者是后者的前提条件。

sentences.english: Practice is prior condition for create phronesis.
sentences.chinese: 实践是形成实践智慧的前提条件。

sentences.english: Development of transport prior to the economic development is a pre - condition and guarantee for economic take-off.
sentences.chinese: 超前发展的交通运输，是经济起飞的前提条件与保障。

sentences.english: Press freedom is a pre-requisite for journalistic ethics.
sentences.chinese: 新闻自由是新闻道德的前提条件。

sentences.english: The orderly management of canal transportation provided the prerequisite to the economic prosperity.
sentences.chinese: 漕运的有序管理，为经济的繁荣发展提供了前提条件。

sentences.english: Homogeneity of the climate data isp recondition on studying climate change.
sentences.chinese: 气候资料的均一性是研究气候变化的前提条件。

sentences.english: It supplies condition for coke oven heating combustion optimal control.
sentences.chinese: 为实现焦炉加热优化控制提供了前提条件。

sentences.english: Determination of words is the prerequisite of "word-by-word writing".
sentences.chinese: 词的确定是“词式书写”的前提条件。

sentences.english: Mr. Yu-Tsen has a very good personality, which is the prerequisite of his artistic accomplishment.
sentences.chinese: 佑增先生人品好，是他艺品的前提条件。

definition: in a nutshell/to put it briefly
in simple terms/to put things simply/briefly
only if (..., or otherwise, ...)/only when/only in the case that/unless
